item.title: Free Utilities to Zip Files in Windows: Quick Notes
item.description: 1. Powershell cmdlet Write-Zip from PSCX Pro: flexible, easy to use Con: relatively time consuming 2. 7-Zip Command-Line Pro: flexible, relatively quicker, easy to be embedded in other scripts Con: (…) 3.
